entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 11. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light after midnight. Temperature steady near minus 11. Wind chill minus 19 this evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 9:13 PM CST Friday 13 January 2023
